en.title: Sanskrit Fundamentals
en.subtitle: Devanagari Reading & Writing · Phonetics Foundation
en.intro: Systematically learn Sanskrit phonetics and Devanagari script, establishing foundation for reading yoga classical texts.

overview.title: Course Overview
items: Introductory Sanskrit linguistics course for yoga teachers and practitioners
Systematic teaching of Devanagari script and Sanskrit phonetics foundation
Based on traditional Sanskrit teaching system with modern linguistic methods
Focus on pronunciation accuracy and text analysis skills

objectives.title: Learning Objectives
items: Master Sanskrit phonetic system (16 vowels, 33 consonants, sound changes)
Establish Devanagari reading and writing ability
Analyze compound word formation in asana names
Acquire basic reading ability for Yoga Sutras texts

items.title: Session 1: Sanskrit Phonetics Foundation
items.content: Devanagari script; vowel system (short, long, compound); consonant system (5 groups); pronunciation practice

items.title: Session 2: Sanskrit Numeral System & Classical Citations
items.content: Cardinal and ordinal numbers; classical text citation format; Yoga Sutras core verses grammatical analysis

items.title: Session 3: Morphological Analysis of Yoga Terminology
items.content: Compound word formation in asana names; etymological analysis; energy system terms (prāṇa, nāḍī, cakra, bandha)

items.title: Session 4: Linguistic Features of Mantra Texts
items.content: Mantra grammatical structure and semantic analysis; common mantra text intensive reading; phonetic rules

methods.title: Teaching Methods
items: Linguistics-oriented: Emphasis on phonemic analysis and pronunciation accuracy
Text-centered: Using Yoga Sutras, asana names, mantras as learning materials
Progressive: From phonetics to vocabulary, from vocabulary to sentences
Practice-integrated: Each session includes pronunciation correction and text analysis exercises

audience.title: Target Audience
items: Yoga teachers: Accurate use of Sanskrit terminology in teaching
Yoga practitioners: Understanding original meanings of classical texts
Language learners: Interested in classical Indo-European languages

materials.title: Teaching Materials
items: Sanskrit Phonetics Handout
Yoga Sanskrit Glossary (with IAST transliteration and explanations)
Selected Yoga Sutras Texts (with vocabulary notes)
Pronunciation demonstration audio

items.label: Materials
items.value: Complete teaching materials provided after enrollment

zh.title: 梵语入门
zh.subtitle: 天城文读写 · 语音学基础
zh.intro: 系统学习梵语语音学与天城文书写，掌握瑜伽经典文本的阅读基础。

overview.title: 课程概述
items: 面向瑜伽教师与练习者的梵语语言学入门课程
系统讲授天城文书写系统与梵语语音学基础
教学内容基于传统梵语教学体系，结合现代语言学方法
注重发音准确性与文本分析能力的培养

objectives.title: 教学目标
items: 掌握梵语语音系统（16元音、33辅音、音变规则）
建立天城文读写能力
解析瑜伽体式名称的复合词构成
具备《瑜伽经》基础文本的阅读能力

items.title: 第一讲：梵语语音学基础
items.content: 天城文书写系统；元音系统（短、长、复合元音）；辅音系统（五组分类）；发音练习与听音辨字

items.title: 第二讲：梵语数字系统与经典引用
items.content: 基数词与序数词；经典文本引用格式；《瑜伽经》核心经文语法分析；阿斯汤加计数实践

items.title: 第三讲：瑜伽术语的形态学分析
items.content: 体式名称复合词构成；词源学分析；能量系统术语（prāṇa, nāḍī, cakra, bandha）

items.title: 第四讲：咒语文本的语言特征
items.content: Mantra语法结构与语义分析；常用咒语文本精读；音韵规则与诵读实践

methods.title: 教学方法
items: 语言学导向：重视音位分析与发音准确性
文本中心：以《瑜伽经》、体式名称、咒语为学习材料
循序渐进：从语音到词汇，从词汇到句子
实践结合：每课包含发音矫正、文本解析练习

audience.title: 适合人群
items: 瑜伽教师：准确使用梵语术语进行教学
瑜伽练习者：理解经典文本原始含义
语言学习者：对古典印欧语系语言感兴趣

materials.title: 教学资料
items: 《梵语语音学讲义》
《瑜伽梵语术语表》（含IAST转写与解释）
《瑜伽经》选读文本（附词汇注释）
发音示范音频

items.value: 线上直播教学（腾讯会议）
